summary: The diff shows modifications to backend/main.mo and project_state.json. The backend file shows the _forceSeedData function being updated with artist records. However, the diff is truncated and we cannot fully verify all three Robert Hood events. No frontend files were modified, so REQ-76 and REQ-77 appear unaddressed.
